name: Marble Eclipse / Discern Destiny
blurb: These games will be for people of all ages from causal gamers to Hardcore gamers it will be cheap to buy and look nice to the eyes.

rewards.reward: We will send you a thank you email plus a High Definition desktop Wallpaper Character one from each games via email. If you want we can send a poster of one character from each game. Reply via email if you want the posters sent.

We will send a High Definition desktop wallpaper one Character from each game, you will also get a thank you email and have your name put into the credits. We will send you a video every week via email about the progression that we have made to both games. The videos will also be specialized just for you.

You will receive a copy of both games when released. You will also receive Special Characters sent via email for your desktop wallpaper. These characters we will not be posting anywhere on the internet. (Also if you want to receive the posters instead of the desktop wallpaper send an email or PM me) you will be a beta tester for both games. Any feed back that you have to make the games better would be appreciated.

You will receive all the rewards from reward #3 (if you don't want to be a beta tester just let us know) you will also be receiving a CD containing the complete sound tracks from both games. Your copy will also be autographed by all the people who worked on these games.

you will receive all the rewards from reward #4 plus a LED T-shirt that lights up in the dark with the Jazari Logo on it. The color of the T-shirt will be up to you. We will also send you some Animated Desktop wallpapers for your computer.

You will receive all rewards from reward #5 plus we will send an exclusive copy of the comic books based off of the games. The comic books will also feature guides, tips and secrets for both games. We will also send some boxes of candy to show our appreciation.

You will receive a copy of both games when released but yours will be special made, the Box art and the CD case of the game will have LED's on them. They will light up and look wonderfully showing that yours is different from anyone else in the world. Your name will be on the box and the CD. You will receive a copy of the animated comics based off each game. With motion, stunning art and voice actors you will want to watch these comics over and over. ( We are only going to make 4 games each with Led box art, CD, case and the animated comics). Your comic and games will be given a number that is unique to your copies. You will also get a chance to design 2 characters one from each game. We will use your story for that character. You will also be able to help us with the music that we will put into the game. If you come up with a tune we will put that into the game as well. If your local I will come to your house and thank you personally with the copies of the special made games and comic. If your international we will send you a super special video showing our thanks. Also you games will have special Guest characters exclusive only for your games. Both Local and International pledges will be given free products for a year when we make more games and more merchandise.
